column5: Beautiful home is located in a nice, safe and family friendly neighborhood & comfortably fits up to 2 guests. Includes 1 big bedroom with one Queen bed and walk in closet, 1 bathroom, access to lounge area. Free Wifi. My place is good for solo adventurers, business travelers, and family with kids(pls see another similar beautiful room I posted).
column8: Beautiful Private Upstairs room in Plano.
